titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the tax treatment of cooperative housing corporations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Hearing Held on Issue by Subcommittee on Select Revenue Measures.

bill.summary: 4/28/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude certain cooperative housing corporations from the rule allowing limited deductions incurred by certain membership organizations in transactions with their members. Prohibits such corporations from using patronage losses to offset earnings which are not patronage earnings.
